cast.name: 约书亚·苏赫曼 Joshua Suherman

director.name: 法加·努格鲁斯 Fajar Nugros

introduction: After their relationship broken by Susan, Bayu faces rising house rent price which makes him, his mother and Cak Jon threatened to be expelled. Fortunately Yowis Ben is popular in Malang and is the only hope that Bayu resolves his financial problems. Unfortunately each personnel has a problem. Yayan is married to Mia; Nando's has family crisis because his father decides to remarry; and Doni has the ambition to have a girlfriend. Bayu fires Cak Jon, then entrusts Yowis Ben to Cak Jim, who claims he has raised many national artists. They also move to Bandung. But, the credibility of Cak Jim is suspicious and Bayu must also soften the heart of the super fiercely father because Bayu fells in love with Asih, his daughter.
